snippet: The percussionist Steven Schick used a panoply of instruments, including his body, at the Miller Theater.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews solo performance by percussionist Steven Schick at Columbia University's Miller Theater.
lead_paragraph: The percussionist Steven Schick used a panoply of instruments, including his body, at the Miller Theater.

headline.seo: Steven Schick Plays Stockhausen at the Miller Theater
headline.main: A Master of Percussion, in Its Sounds and Gestures
headline.print_headline: A Master of Percussion, in Its Sounds and Gestures
